title: Textile, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: float patterned satin; 7 &1 satin patterned by weft floats bound on the front as a 1 & 3 twill
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 92 x 55 cm (36 1/4 x 21 5/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 92 x 55 cm (36 1/4 x 21 5/8 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Blue with a floral and scroll pattern.
